product_name: Slime Pro Tubeless Sealant - 8 fl. oz.
long_description: Designed for use with tubeless tires, the 8 fl. oz. Slime Pro Tubeless Sealant instantly seals punctures up to 1/8 in. to keep you riding longer. Formula contains a rust treatment designed to protect your wheels from corrosion. Tropical scent smells of coconuts-no more toxic chemical smell. Lightweight Slime Pro Tubeless Sealant weighs in at just 1g per ml. Recommended quantity is 3 oz. (90ml) for downhill use; 2 oz. (60ml) for cross-country and 1.5 oz. (45ml) for road.
short_description: Designed for use with tubeless tires, the 8 fl. oz. Slime Pro Tubeless Sealant instantly seals punctures up to 1/8 in. to keep you riding longer.
